title: Remove all images from the portfolio site (no portraits, logos, or background images) and republish

requirements.text: Remove all pictures/images from the website UI so that no elements render anywhere (including portraits, logos, and decorative background images), and ensure the layout remains visually clean using only CSS gradients/shapes/text.
acceptanceCriteria: No pages render any elements (Home, About, Services, Skills, Portfolio, Contact, Header, Footer).
The Home hero section uses a CSS-based background (e.g., gradient) instead of loading /assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png.
Header and Footer do not load /assets/generated/logo-sti.dim_512x512.png; replace with a text-only brand mark.
No broken-image icons/empty image frames/portrait borders remain visible after image removal.
All pages remain responsive and visually balanced after removing the right-side portrait column/space.

requirements.text: Remove or disable all portrait-related components/usages so they are not imported/rendered anywhere (including RightSidePortrait, ProfilePortrait usages if any, and legacy SectionCornerPortrait/SectionMediumPortrait if referenced).
acceptanceCriteria: No page imports or renders RightSidePortrait (currently used in HeroSection and all main pages).
Portrait configuration in frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts is not referenced by any rendered component route.
SectionCornerPortrait and SectionMediumPortrait are not rendered anywhere in the app (directly or indirectly).

requirements.text: Republish the site so the updated no-images version is live under the existing production identifier exactly: "sheik-tonmoy-islam".
acceptanceCriteria: A production build is generated and deployed successfully.
The live site at https://sheik-tonmoy-islam.caffeine.xyz/ reflects the removal of all images across all pages.
Manual spot-check: navigating all routes shows no images and no broken-image placeholders.

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for removing images.
nonGoals: Do not add the newly uploaded images (Tonmoy islam pic-3.png, Tonmoy islam pic-4.png) anywhere on the site.
Do not introduce new third-party services or external asset hosting.
Do not change contact form backend persistence behavior.
